title: champions on perma ban for me
body: {{champion:55}} too mobile. 100-0 too fast.  {{champion:105}} Ult to fuckin big in lane cant flash it.   whose on your PERMA ban list! Comment below. With an explanation

replies.body:
I don't have anyone perma-ban all the time.
But currently, I'd probably ban Vayne/Rengar/Kha'Zix because they're a little overtuned at the moment. Or whoever hard counters teamcomp.
Meh.

{{champion:157}} always - unless our first pick wants him.

Both {{champion:55}} and {{champion:7}} _used_ to be on there, but I find them to be OK after their reworks.

{{champion:107}} has taken their place until Rito fixes his passive.
{{champion:157}} hands down. Just can't risk someone in my team playing him.
